name: Heaven Office (Doctor_Vov, PunkGagarin, TonTon9)
description:
Heaven Office is a game about after-death bureaucracy inspired by "Papers, Please".

 People die all the time, and you have to determine what they will become when they are born again.

  • What happens if a dangerous maniac is going to be reborn in the body of a cute hamster? 
  • What happens if a dictator becomes a baker? 
  • And how will your bosses react to such decisions? 

Come into the game "Heaven Office" and take on the role of a heaven clerk! 

Send souls to rebirth, trying to understand what your superiors want from you (it will not work) and deserve your own rebirth!
